document_data.name: Junyu
document_data.patron deity: [[Path of the Enlightenment|Way of the Enlightenment]]
document_data.mainbody: '''Junyu''' was one of the greatest swordsmen in [[Kuda]] in [[Kozakura]] in [[1357 DR]].
document_data.Activities: Junyu was once one of the most talented duelists in Kozakura, tutoring many students, but sensing a void in his life he decided to become a priest in a [[Konjo]] temple. Junyu still accepted a few pupils but now his lessons to them were harder and more philosophical. His current pupil was [[Miyoshi]].
